name: Eliadora Foster
text: Yesterday was the first time going to Blaze Pizza üòç. I'm on Keto diet and I was finally able to enjoy a pizza. Yummy. Choose your toppings: pesto sauce, red onions, green bell peppers, spinach, artichoke, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms and sausage. Baked... top with olive oil.   A party in your mouth.

name: B
text: Top shelf ingredients, delicious food and excellent service!

name: Jeff Oostyen
text: Build your own pizza? Extra toppings? Friendly staff? Still "fast" food? Super yummy? YES, YES, YES, YES, and YES. I love this place!!! You should go and give it a try. Make your taste buds smile üòã for a week.

text: Ew idk what his name was but he had an awful attitude we came in like 3 minutes before they closed which I get but but like y‚Äôall have to serve us until you close so get over it this is what you‚Äôre paid to do there‚Äôs no point in being rude ‚Ä¶More

text: A preferred place for quality pizza. The staff was very kind and attentive. This place has a great feel to it. I can see why they have a lot of great reviews.

name: M. O.
text: One of the best place. The option of building own pizza is amazing. I can recomend this place where you can try really delicious pizza.

name: Ariel Stephenson
text: pizza and the atmosphere at this spot is very good. i like it here, great food & service. looking forward to coming back with my coworkers. bring your hunger - portions are generous. mood here is similar to fresno's scene.

name: Jenni Eisenberg
text: Always good! Appreciate their efforts to keep guests safe during covid. Guy who cashed us out was very friendly. Thanks for a yummy lunch... haven't been here in months due to covid and am glad to be able to dine-in.

name: grayson mendez
text: pizza... super tasty. It was so delicious. Service is consistently good. The bill was reasonable I would say.

name: Reed Goodfriend
text: Best of the fast casual pizza places and the only one I've been to that uses fresh dough.

name: MJ K

text: One of my top spots for tasty Pizza. I had a brother come into town and asked me to take him back here.

name: Madeleine
text: I did a build your own pizza and it came out in no time. The portion size was large but filling for a good, hearty lunch. I was so amazed by how little time it took for the pizza to be made. Delicious!

name: Carissa Jantz
text: Great service @ Blaze pizza! We used curb side pick up and I ordered the wrong pizza. Dasys was nice enough to make us a new pizza and give us free drinks while waiting. We left with three large pizzas, a drink and garlic knots for only $26. ‚ù§Ô∏èblaze pizza!

name: Angela Carpenter
text: My first time here...worth the wait! Pizza dough is crisp, like it should be. I got the spicy red sauce, which does have a kick to it. For it being like fast-food pizza, the service is great and so is the pizza. Fast favorite üòç and I love the motto.

name: Paul Kostel

text: Nice, clean location. Has good outdoor seating.

text: This is were my love affair with Blaze Pizza all started. Great pizza made your way piled high with as many toppings as you could possibly want! With great, efficient, and friendly staff, what more could you want?!

text: This place use to be good when the first opened. But now the service is bad, place is dirty and the food is never ready when you order ahead. It said it would be ready at 6 and now its 6:30 and its still not ready. This literally has happened the past 4 times. And my dough was raw.

text: The person taking my order was not wearing gloves and his mask was not covering his nose and/or nostrils. When he started to make my pizza, I told him I didn't to make my pizza. He acted surprised and unaware, and asked me why not. Really??? How long has this Covid pandemic been going on?

text: This is just another Blaze, so you know what you can expect. I had the Hot Link Pizza and I enjoyed the spiciness! It may be a little too spicy for some people. It took around 7-10 minutes to cook my pizza, which was pretty fast. It was also kinda busy an hour to closing.

text: Blaze Pizza never delivered the pizza we ordered.  We ordered delivery, and never received it. name: Douglas Sperber
text: It's like Subway for pizza. Only better (sorry Subway). Just add whatever you want to your pizza and a few minutes you have a warm, thin crust marvel. Excellent crust, good sauces, and fun toppings. Pizza is a dime-a-dozen. Some places have IT and some don't... Blaze definitely has IT!

name: Alan Chaney

text: Friendly and a great place to sit and enjoy your meal. They have a shuffleboard game as well

text: I love how they make the pizza in front of you. I caught them making dough and it looked (and tasted) so fresh! The employees are very nice and friendly.
